alert.note: Alert for Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 8:39AM CDT until March 27 at 3:18AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... James River at Galena affecting Stone County. James River NEAR Boaz affecting Stone and Christian Counties. .Heavy rainfall that occurred Thursday evening and early Friday has led to the river rising several feet above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Galena. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 6.7 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
